title: The art of erosion
caption: The art of erosion
desc: Rising out of the otherwise green landscape here in the south of France, these otherworldly sand and clay towers could be a scene from 'The Lord of the Rings' - or another planet. Nature has been carving out this incredible landscape here in the Eastern Pyrenees for millions of years - and it hasn’t finished yet. The weather is still whittling away at the Orgues d’Ille-sur-Têt (orgues is French for organs, and they do bear a passing resemblance to church organ pipes) near the city of Perpignan.
